reviewText:
I'm going to write a few key words and song lyrics to hopefully help others find this!!!  "Color wheel color wheel, spinning around, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, brown" "get down, with brown!!" "sad red fred, sitting all alone in the flower bed" "greeeeeey!!! everything is so greeeeeey!" black and white go well together, one is dark, and one is light, a great combination black and white"

So thankful I finally found this movie after years of searching. and I LOVE that it literally looks and sounds like a VHS even though its a dvd. <3 the nostalgia was overwhelming and my 4 year old son loved it.
Great product for little ones to begin learning their colors!  There are several other dvd's available for the beginning learning stages for little ones.
my students love watching this DVD.  the songs helped them with shapes. i'm so happy that the DVD came when expected.  i recommend this seller to everyone.
my students love watching this DVD.  the songs helped them with shapes. i'm so happy that the DVD came when expected.  i recommend this seller to everyone.
This was aweful, its painful to watch.  DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. The colors and sound were terrible, it didin't even hold my son's attention for 30 seconds.
